provider.name: Deepbricks
provider.description: Deepbricks is an inference API to call models like GPT-4o, Claude, Llama over a unified API.

models.title: Chat Completions and Image Generations
models.description: Portkey supports the chat completions and image generation APIs for Deepbricks.

models.title: Chat
models.description: Portkey supports the chat API for Deepbricks models

models.description: Portkey supports the image generation API for Deepbricks models

notSupported.promptPlayground: Prompt playground is not supported for Deepbricks models

integrationViaVirtualKey.description: Integrate Deepbricks using Portkey's virtual key system

inline.text: Get your API key from Deepbricks and add it to Portkey to create a virtual key.
inline.description: You can get your Deepbricks API key from the Deepbricks website [here](https://deepbricks.ai/api-key).

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Python
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python SDK code for gpt-4o chat completions call on Deepbricks using virtual key

portkeyNodeSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Node.js
portkeyNodeSDK.codeExample: sample node.js SDK code for gpt-4o chat completions call on Deepbricks using virtual key
